attributes.action: protect & help people recieving DLA who are having to reapply due to Government changes in how this benefit is allocated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who are genuinely chronically ill/disabled & have been recieving DLA/SDA are having to do battle with their local DHS/GP's etc to reapply/appeal to have their allowances re-instated.This is causing untold stress,distress & adding to their illnessess & no doubt will cause ultimately some poor souls death.HOW DOES THE GOVERMENT INTEND TO LOOK AFTER THESE VULNERABLE PEOPLE IN OUR SOCIETY ??

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "protect & help people recieving DLA who are having to reapply due to Government changes in how this benefit is allocated."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19459
